TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawingVisual extends System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual

summary.span: 是可用于在屏幕上呈现矢量图形的视觉对象。

span.span: is a visual object that can be used to render vector graphics on the screen.
The content is persisted by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个轻量绘图类，用于呈现形状、图像或文本。 is a lightweight drawing class that is used to render shapes, images, or text. 此类被视为轻型类，因为它不提供布局、输入、焦点或事件处理，从而提高了性能。This class is considered lightweight because it does not provide layout, input, focus, or event handling, which improves its performance. 因此，绘图非常适用于背景和剪贴画。For this reason, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art. 为了使用 对象，需要为对象创建主机容器。In order to use objects, you need to create a host container for the objects. 宿主容器对象必须派生自 类，该类提供类不支持的布局和事件处理支持 。The host container object must be derived from the class, which provides the layout and event handling support that the class does not support. 宿主容器对象不显示任何可视属性，因为它的主要用途是包含子对象。The host container object does not display any visual properties, since its main purpose is to contain child objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 DrawingVisual 对象](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/using-drawingvisual-objects)。For more information, see [Using DrawingVisual Objects](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/using-drawingvisual-objects). 有关演示如何创建 具有主机容器的对象的完整示例，请参阅 [使用 Drawingvisuals 进行的命中测试示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159994) 。For a complete example showing how to create objects with a host container, see the [Hit Test Using DrawingVisuals Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159994) .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建 对象时，它没有绘制内容。When you create a object, it has no drawing content. 可以通过检索对象的绘图上下文并在其中进行绘制来添加文本、图形或图像内容。You can add text, graphic, or image content by retrieving the drawing context of the object and drawing into it. 通过调用对象的方法来返回一个绘图上下文 。A drawing context is returned by calling the method of a object. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 将创建一个对象，并在其绘图上下文中绘制一个矩形。In the following example, a object is created, and a rectangle is drawn into its drawing context. 请注意，必须调用的 方法 来持久保存绘图内容。Notice that you must call the method of the to persist drawing content. [!code-csharp[DrawingVisualSample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[DrawingVisualSample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Drawing As DrawingGroup
public: property System::Windows::Media::DrawingGroup ^ Drawing { System::Windows::Media::DrawingGroup ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象的绘图内容。

span.span: Gets the drawing content of the object.

value.span: 获取一个 类型的值，该值表示 中 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a value of type that represents the collection of objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视觉对象将其呈现数据存储为矢量图形指令列表。A visual object stores its rendering data as a vector graphics instruction list. 指令列表中的每一项都以序列化格式表示一组低级别的图形数据。Each item in the instruction list represents a low-level set of graphics data in a serialized format. 有关视觉对象如何存储图形数据的详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 图形呈现概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview)。For more information on how visual objects store graphics data, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview). 对返回值所做的任何更改 都不会保留 。Any change to the returned value is not persisted by the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 枚举了主机视觉对象中每个的的值。In the following example, the value of each in a host visual is enumerated. [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#DrawingVisualSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/DrawingVisual.xaml.cs#drawingvisualsnippet1)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#DrawingVisualSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/drawingvisual.xaml.vb#drawingvisualsnippet1)]

summary.span: 确定是否已命中可视对象的边界。

span.span: determines whether the bounds of the visual object has been hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值的属性表示已命中的视觉对象。The property of the return value represents the visual object that was hit.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext RenderOpen() cil managed

summary.span: 打开用于呈现的 对象。
返回的 值可用于呈现为 。

span.span: The returned value can be used to render into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的方法时 ，当前绘图内容将替换为定义的任何以前的绘图内容 。When you call the method of the , the current drawing content replaces any previous drawing content defined for the . 这意味着无法将新的绘图内容追加到现有的绘图内容。This means that there is no way to append new drawing content to existing drawing content. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 将创建一个对象并返回该对象 。In the following example, a object is created, and its returned. [!code-csharp[DrawingVisualSample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[DrawingVisualSample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)] 绘制到绘图上下文中的顺序非常重要，每个后续绘图都是在其他绘图之上绘制的。The order in which you draw into the drawing context is important - each succeeding drawing is drawn on top of the others. 在下面的示例中，先绘制矩形，然后绘制文本。In the following example, the rectangle is drawn first, then the text. [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#RenderOrderSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#renderordersnippet1)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#RenderOrderSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#renderordersnippet1)]
